backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue nodes, activities, memorable moments, and save data with methods to start or continue a game.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for replica error handling and retry logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup table summarizing major frontend files and their roles in UI, gameplay, scenes, and systems.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling navigation, startup logic, backend launch handling with error normalization, and retry flow.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of activities that affect trust and may unlock moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Implements a Zustand-based audio manager with volume, mute control, and background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Renders a 3D Puro character with idle animation and interaction handling for dialogue triggering.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Provides touch-based joystick and look controls for mobile devices, updating player movement and camera look.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Tracks keyboard, joystick, and look input to compute movement vectors and look deltas for the player.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Contains definitions and metadata for placeable customization items and their allowed locations.
Defines dialogue nodes and branching choices with trust effects and optional requirements for Puro's conversations.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: In‑game view mounting the 3D canvas, initializing game state, managing overlays, and handling mount success or errors.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Generates contextual letter responses based on keyword detection from predefined friendly, curious, and encouraging sets.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a book-sorting minigame that adjusts trust based on correct categorization and signals completion.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: A drawing-viewing mini-game where players cycle through Puro’s drawings, gaining trust for viewing all images.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: A timed hide-and-seek guessing mini-game where finding Puro affects trust and ends when he’s found or time runs out.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: A launcher component that displays a menu and loads selected mini-games like book sorting, drawing, or hide-and-seek.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Displays a selected moment’s title and scene content in a modal-like card with a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines the Moment interface and provides a list of moments with titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Renders the 3D library scene with player movement, lighting, objects, and Puro, updating camera and player position each frame.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Zustand store managing trust, progress, UI visibility, unlocks, letters, and customization data with persistent state.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending structures and a list of endings based on trust thresholds, plus a helper to select the matching ending.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the game’s ending based on trust level, shows final scene and options to start a new game or return to title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders an activity selection menu that adjusts trust, completes activities, and may unlock moments.
Displays discovered and placed customization items and allows placing new items in the library.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Shows dialogue nodes with selectable choices that modify trust and navigate the dialogue tree.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Allows writing letters and viewing responses, enforcing length limits and generating delayed replies.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Lists unlockable moments and lets the player view unlocked ones via a moment player.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Provides pause options including resume, quick-access menus, settings, and progress reset.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Offers audio controls such as mute and volume adjustment with a back navigation option.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Displays the player's trust level with a color-coded label and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching game state and performing game-related backend mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time app startup tasks like asset preloading and storage checks with idempotent control.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Renders the game's credits screen with description, features, and a link back to the title screen.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays user‑friendly and detailed error diagnostics when game launch fails, with retry and back options.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches game runtime errors, shows a styled error card with optional stack details, and lets the user return to the title screen.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the game’s title menu with background, logo, and buttons for new game, continue, settings, and credits, handling loading/disabled states.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch-related errors into user-friendly messages and categories for new-game or continue actions.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the app’s startup initialization flow, responsibilities, and extension guidelines.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the game’s concept, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for state tracking.
